Description: Yellow or green glazed steatite or glazed composition scarab: engraved on the base with Horus the child, kneeling, the red crown of Lower Egypt on his head. Summary style. There is a hole pierced through longitudinally.
Bibliographic references: Giveon R 1985a / Egyptian scarabs from Western Asia from the collections of the British Museum (p.150, no.46)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
